about_the_game:
"Atomic Butcher: Homo Metabolicus" original Soundtrack - A collection of all music tracks used in the game. This pounding industrial-metal soundtrack is the score to the excessive violence and preposterous mayhem going on in "Atomic Butcher: Homo Metabtolicus", blaring from the speakers as the Butcher slaughters his way through a post-apocalyptic wasteland. The tracks were composed by two members of Austrian Black Metal Band "Locus Neminis", Franz Enkner and Xarius Neminis. The OST incorporates brutal metal-riffs, driving techno beats and ambient soundscapes to create an aural representation of a world gone utterly insane!

Included are 22 tracks that amount to a total of 73 minutes.

Tracklist:
01. Atomic Playground Theme (02:36)
02. A Wonderful World (01:35)
03. Project Demiurge (03:58)
04. Walking Brain Thing (03:36)
05. WWIII Bunker Theme (01:29)
06. Gooey Gushing Gutspill (02:07)
07. Waste Nectar (04:24)
08. Hip Sandwich (02:15)
09. sdfasd2000 (04:36)
10. Yellow Mellow (04:15)
11. Tasty Mutant Chop (03:34)
12. Nasty Bladder (04:16)
13. Post Apocalyptic Hipster Theme (04:04)
14. Death Factory (02:05)
15. Meatflakes (02:22)
16. Electrocute (04:24)
17. Fat Cyborg (03:14)
18. Darkness Dweller (04:28)
19. Flesh for Fantasy (04:31)
20. Ascent on the Holy Meat Mountain (02:04)
21. My Tummy is a Meat Reactor (04:21)
22. Super Fetus (02:45)
